p:
As shown in Figure 4, with the increase in germination time, the removal rate of ABTS, DPPH,
O 2 −
˙, and ˙OH radical, decrease in the reducing power, and inhibition rate of lipid peroxidation of Gsp showed a gradual and significant ( p ≤ 0.05) increment trend. Table 3 shows that compared to 0d, EC 50 of DPPH, ABTS,
O 2 −
˙, ˙OH radical, and lipid peroxidation of Gsp germinated for 3d decreased by 17.87%, 21.85%, 12.75%, 11.00%, and 27.25%, respectively (Table 3). Generally speaking, Gsp had the significant antioxidant activities in a dose‐dependent manner, and germination could enhance antioxidant activities of soybean protein.
